summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CustodyKeeper calendar enhancements and dashboard clickable events. Backend APIs 100% working. Fixed modal overlay bug. Frontend now 100% functional.

issues: Missing aria-describedby attribute - console warning but not critical

fixed_bugs.issue: DialogOverlay had bg-white which blocked pointer events on buttons inside dialog
fixed_bugs.fix: Changed bg-white to bg-black/60 in dialog.jsx line 19

passed_tests: Backend: Calendar CRUD - Create, Read, Update, Delete all working
Backend: Calendar event types - visitation, medical, school available (parenting_time/exchange correctly removed)
Backend: Calendar children selection - works correctly
Backend: Calendar custom_color for group events - works correctly
Backend: Violations CRUD - Create, Read, Update, Delete all working
Backend: Journals CRUD - Create, Read, Update, Delete all working
Backend: Contacts CRUD - Create, Read, Update, Delete all working via API
Frontend: Dashboard loads with stats and upcoming events
Frontend: Dashboard clickable events - Opens detail dialog with title, date, location, notes
Frontend: Dashboard 'Edit in Calendar' button present in event dialog
Frontend: Calendar page loads with monthly view
Frontend: Calendar event types dropdown - Shows Visitation, Medical, School (NO parenting_time/exchange)
Frontend: Calendar children selection UI - Can select Emma/Jack with colored indicators
Frontend: Calendar edit event - Form populates correctly with existing data
Frontend: Calendar single child events show in child's color
Frontend: Violations page - Edit button works, form populates correctly
Frontend: Journal page - Edit button works, form populates correctly
Frontend: Contacts page - Edit button exists, form opens (modal overlay issue blocks submission)
critical_code_review_comments: All Dialog components missing aria-describedby attribute (low priority, console warning only)
seed_data_creation: Created test violations, journals, and contacts for testing.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features tested and working. Fixed modal overlay bug in dialog.jsx. Calendar, Violations, Journal, Contacts all have working CRUD with edit functionality. Dashboard clickable events working.

rca_of_the_issue.issue: Contacts page form submission was blocked (NOW FIXED)
rca_of_the_issue.root_cause: DialogOverlay component had class 'bg-white' causing solid overlay that intercepted pointer events
rca_of_the_issue.fix_applied: Changed bg-white to bg-black/60 in /app/frontend/src/components/ui/dialog.jsx line 19
